name: UNCalendarNotificationTrigger
desc: A trigger condition that causes a notification the system delivers at a specific date and time.

items.name: init(dateMatching: DateComponents, repeats: Bool)
items.desc: Creates a calendar trigger using the date components parameter.

items.name: func nextTriggerDate() -> Date?
items.desc: The next date at which the trigger conditions are met.

items.name: var dateComponents: DateComponents
items.desc: The date components to construct this object.
